description: The carpenter craftsman family organization is a family enterprise including grandmother http://anidb.net/ch44091 [Ritsu], mother http://anidb.net/ch44092 [Risa] and daughter http://anidb.net/ch8585 [Rin], plus the apprentices http://anidb.net/ch44090 [Toketa], http://anidb.net/ch44089 [Itaichi], Etekichi, and http://anidb.net/ch32916 [Mikoto].
name: Shokunin Ikka Kankeisha
